name: Kameo
description: The Games on Demand version supports English, French, Italian, German, Spanish, Japanese, Korean and Chinese. Download the manual for this game by locating the game on http://marketplace.xbox.com and selecting “See Game Manual". Unleash the powers within you! An epic adventure from legendary developer Rare, Ltd. There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.
